channel.title: Client running problem for friend but works fine for me
channel.description: When I start my client nothing goes wrong it goes perfectly and runs smooth but when my friend starts it the command prompt it says "The system cannont find path specified." How would we fix this?

item.title: Client running problem for friend but works fine for me
item.dc:creator: @BlacknRaven BlacknRaven
item.description:
@BlacknRaven wrote:

kk somtimes it works but it’s diffrent on some computer but i have windows vista so thats probly why XD =Þ

item.title: Client running problem for friend but works fine for me
item.dc:creator: @showpath showpath
item.description:
@showpath wrote:

if what blacknraven didnt work go to where you installed java for me C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre6\bin it could be diffrent like C:\Program Files\Java\jre6\bin find java.exe copy it and paste it in C:\Windows\System32 then try again i did that when i got a new comp and it worked

Read full topic
item.source: Client running problem for friend but works fine for me

item.title: Client running problem for friend but works fine for me
item.dc:creator: @BlacknRaven BlacknRaven
item.description:
@BlacknRaven wrote:

It Must be his java make sure its set up for his java here give this code to him to put in run.bat

@ECHO OFF color 77 title Client Name echo Your Client is Loading.. JAVA -Xmx500m EGUI

Read full topic
